pages.text: $(li)The Honey Block is a block that has works very well with pistons.
$(li)When a Honey Block is moved by a piston, it attempts to move all adjacent blocks in the same directions.
$(li)A Honey Block can move any block a Sticky Piston can pull, except Glazed Terracota and Slime Blocks.
$(li)The blocks that are move may, in turn, push other blocks, as if they were being pushed by a piston

$(li)When the adjacent block that is moved is also a Honey Block, that block also attempts to move all its adjacent blocks.$(br)$(li)Honey Blocks are not pulled by a non-sticky piston, nor are they moved if an adjacent (non-honey) block is moved by a piston.
$(li)The maximum of 12 blocks moved by a piston still applies.$(br)$(li)Honey Blocks moved by pistons do not move entities that are touching the side or bottom of the block.
